      • putItem

        public int putItem(java.lang.String id,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> uriParams,
                   T item,
                   int version)
            throws ItemStoreException
        A put-or-create version of putItem. WARN: if item has encryption, the call to "createItem" will encrypt the item if it fails with ItemAlreadyExistsException then "replaceItem" will encrypt the item again. And the item's passwords will be saved twice encrypted PLEASE DO NOT USE if item can be encrypted
        Specified by:
        putItem in interface ItemWriteStore<T>
        Parameters:
        id -
        uriParams -

        Throws:
